name: relax-a-little
description: This extension provides tools to relax like giving reminders to look somewhere else, drink water, walk or do some lunges while also changes theme to dark mode automatically in the evening if not already set as dark. Comes with lot of configurations to control time of reminder, interval, water amount in a day you want to intake and more

relaxALittle.sunrise.name: sunrise
relaxALittle.sunrise.description: Set the sunrise time. (24 hour format)

relaxALittle.sunset.description: Set the sunset time. (24 hour format)

relaxALittle.interval.description: Set in which interval relax-a-little should check the time. (in minutes)

relaxALittle.minutesTillBreak.description: Time in minutes until theme colors start fading out.

relaxALittle.winddownDurationMinutes.description: Time in minutes until theme colors have fully faded out.

relaxALittle.breakDurationMinutes.description: Time in minutes until theme colors are reset to normal.

relaxALittle.winddownFramesPerMinute.description: Color update frequency during winddown phase. Usually you do not need to change this. Lower it if you are distracted by screen flashes, increase it for smoother color transitions. Must be between 1 and 60.

relaxALittle.minutesTillWaterBreak.description: Time in minutes until water break.

relaxALittle.waterBreakBlocking.description: Should water break notification be blocking or non blocking?

relaxALittle.winddownActive.description: Is winddown feature running or do you need it?

relaxALittle.waterBreakActive.description: Is water break reminder feature running or do you need it?
